text: The 1976–77 Boston Bruins season was the Bruins' 53rd season in the NHL. The season involved participating in the Stanley Cup finals. ==Offseason== ===NHL Draft=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="2.75%" | Round ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="2.75%" | # !
